subject: Davis Cup
Tennis
lead_paragraph: The world's top four players are finshed for the season, but No. 5 David Ferrer is attempting to lead Spain to a sixth Davis Cup title this weekend against the Czech Republic in Prague.
snippet: The world's top four players are finshed for the season, but No. 5 David Ferrer is attempting to lead Spain to a sixth Davis Cup title this weekend against the Czech Republic in Prague.
